issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Trying to import a volume with HVM image like this:

{code}
# euca-import-volume -z az-01 -s 10 -f raw -b centos7-new-az-01 -d "CentOS 7 for az-01" --prefix CentOS7 --owner-akid $EC2_ACCESS_KEY --owner-sak $EC2_SECRET_KEY CentOS-7-x86_64-GenericCloud-20141129_01.raw
{code}

The imaging worker does not come up as an instance. The log just keep repeating following:

{code}
2015-12-02 00:36:28  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:36:38  INFO | Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType
2015-12-02 00:36:38  INFO | Failed to send message RunInstancesType to service EucalyptusRequestQueueSync because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType
2015-12-02 00:36:38  INFO | Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType
2015-12-02 00:36:38  INFO | Failed to send message RunInstancesType to service EucalyptusRequestQueueSync because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType
2015-12-02 00:36:48  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:36:58  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:37:08  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:37:18  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:37:28  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
2015-12-02 00:37:38  INFO | Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::000070383101:autoScalingGroup:5ef26047-202c-4587-8560-6c40f35bee4f:autoScalingGroupName/euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG Launch
{code}

The describe conversion tasks shows:

{code}
# euca-describe-conversion-tasks 
TaskType	IMPORTVOLUME	TaskId	import-vol-8f748bc4	ExpirationTime	Wed Dec 09 00:30:28 EST 2015	Status	activStatusMessage	Pending conversion
DISKIMAGE	DiskImageFormat	RAW	DiskImageSize	8589934592	VolumeId	vol-b0dab45c	VolumeSize	10	AvailabilityZone	az-01	ApproximateBytesConverted	0
TaskType	IMPORTVOLUME	TaskId	import-vol-1e50802e	ExpirationTime	Wed Dec 09 00:03:59 EST 2015	Status	activStatusMessage	Pending conversion
DISKIMAGE	DiskImageFormat	RAW	DiskImageSize	8589934592	VolumeId	vol-2ef13987	VolumeSize	10	AvailabilityZone	az-01	ApproximateBytesConverted	0

{code}
What could be the issue here ?
fields.summary: Create default VPC if it does not exist before imaging stack creation

comments.body:
The volume seems to be created if I check {{euca-describe-volumes verbose}} but imaging worker is still not present. More information the imaging worker:

{code}
services.imaging.import_task_expiration_hours = 168
services.imaging.import_task_timeout_minutes = 180
services.imaging.worker.availability_zones = 
services.imaging.worker.configured = true
services.imaging.worker.expiration_days = 180
services.imaging.worker.healthcheck = true
services.imaging.worker.image = emi-e9de3dd9
services.imaging.worker.init_script = 
services.imaging.worker.instance_type = m1.medium
services.imaging.worker.keyname = 
services.imaging.worker.log_server = 
services.imaging.worker.log_server_port = 514
services.imaging.worker.ntp_server = 
{code}

The UFS is not on CLC

{code}
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.10.206.16  API_10.10.206.16.imaging         enabled  
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus        10.10.206.15                     enabled  
{code}

{code}
# euscale-describe-launch-configs  verbose
LAUNCH-CONFIG	euca-internal-imaging-service-LaunchConfiguration-Y0QENJZSLRJ9I	emi-e9de3dd9	m1.medium		euca-internal-imaging-service-InstanceProfile-JGPV7MWR6XLGJ

# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups verbose
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	euca-internal-imaging-service-ASG-COPQNOF9PLRZG	euca-internal-imaging-service-LaunchConfiguration-Y0QENJZSLRJ9I	az-02,az-01		2	2	2	Default

# euca-describe-groups  verbose
GROUP	sg-3fa46f7b	000996324612	default	default group	
GROUP	sg-52804e61	000996324612	default	default VPC security group	vpc-773ba654
PERMISSION	000996324612	default	ALLOWS	-1			FROM	USER	000996324612	NAME	default	ID	sg-52804e61	ingress
PERMISSION	000996324612	default	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	000996324612	default	ALLOWS	icmp	-1	-1	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	000996324612	default	ALLOWS	-1			TO	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	egress
GROUP	sg-40eda501	000070383101	euca-internal-imaging-service-SecurityGroup-UAJ0HUOSV1KTV	Security group for the Imaging workers	
GROUP	sg-df138b51	000528304206	default	default group	
GROUP	sg-9aaecf32	000070383101	default	default group
{code}

{code}
# euform-describe-stacks verbose
STACK	euca-internal-imaging-service	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Imaging worker stack	2015-12-02T05:16:57.259Z
PARAMETER	CERTARN		****
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-e9de3dd9
PARAMETER	InitScript		
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName		
PARAMETER	NtpServer		
PARAMETER	LogServer		
PARAMETER	LogServerPort		514
PARAMETER	ImagingServiceUrl		imaging.atlpocloud.local
PARAMETER	EuareServiceUrl		euare.atlpocloud.local
PARAMETER	ComputeServiceUrl		compute.atlpocloud.local
PARAMETER	VmExpirationDays		180
PARAMETER	AvailabilityZones		az-02,az-01
PARAMETER	NumberOfWorkers		2
{code}

The cloud is configured with VPC.

Finally found why it is stuck but still not able to understand why this is the reason for it to get stuck for because default VPC exists

{code}

Switched to the "(eucalyptus)imaging" account and created a default vpc. Then deleted the stack and re-created it. This time it picked up the subnets and created the imaging worker instance.
[~dshekhawat], I am wondering if fix(s) for EUCA-11021 or EUCA-10694 for some reason are gone. What is the value for cloud.vpc.defaultvpc on your set up?

Hi [~vasya], tracing back on my history I found that once I described all vpc in the system via {{euca-describe-vpcs verbose}} and deleted all of them as cloud administator. This was done after I had disabled or deleted the imaging stack via {{esi-manage -a delete imaging}}. Now that I know this was done, I realize that when you create the stack back via {{esi-manage -a create imaging}} it needs a default VPC that I deleted manually hence it got stuck. At-least that is my current assumption until you think otherwise. The cloud property you mentioned is however set to true {{cloud.vpc.defaultvpc = true}}.

Thanks again for quickly looking at this ticket appreciate your help.

[~sjones], I see few solutions to problems like this one. System can periodically check that default vpc exist and if it is not present switch service availability to disabled or we can deprecate default vpc deletion for service accounts. Thoughts?
[~vasya], a solution could be to check for, and if necessary create, the default VPC prior to creating the stack.

Verified that there's a default VPC for imaging system account and the imaging stack was created successfully.

{code:java}
[root@e-01 imaging]# euca-describe-vpcs
VPC	vpc-96bc6762	available	172.31.0.0/16	dopt-9b1943a5	default	true
[root@e-01 imaging]# euform-describe-stacks
